name: RAG Knowledge Catalog
title: RAG Knowledge Catalog
description: Registry of documents and artifacts ingested into the FAISS vector store for RAG operations.

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Source attribution for all retrieved content
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: User controls what content is ingested
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Explicit mapping of documents to vector IDs
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Unified ingestion catalog across all agents

document_ingestion.description: Standard flow for document ingestion with chunking and metadata
document_ingestion.use_when: Adding new unstructured data to the RAG system

anti_patterns.name: Duplicate Ingestion
anti_patterns.problem: Ingesting the same file under different relative paths
anti_patterns.fix: Use normalized absolute paths as unique identifiers
